tswitem.name: Vivifying Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Vivifying Augment Resonator
An unattuned healing augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase your critical power by 5%/ 7%/ 9%/ 10%2/ 15% for this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 2 Attuned Mending Augment Resonators
  • 30 Pure denkyem runes
  • 30 Pure dust
